div.p: This code system http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: CPT procedure and modifier codes are submitted to payers to convey the specific procedure performed. CPT codes are available by subscription from the AMA at http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt.

copyright.value: Copyright 2014 American Medical Association (AMA). All rights reserved. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
